org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.hash

类 CompactingHashTable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.hash.AbstractMutableHashTable<T>
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.hash.CompactingHashTable<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - Record type stored in hash table

    public class CompactingHashTable<T>
extends AbstractMutableHashTable<T>
    A hash table that uses Flink's managed memory and supports replacement of records or updates to records. For an overview of the general data structure of the hash table, please refer to the description of the MutableHashTable.

    The hash table is internally divided into two parts: The hash index, and the partition buffers that store the actual records. When records are inserted or updated, the hash table appends the records to its corresponding partition, and inserts or updates the entry in the hash index. In the case that the hash table runs out of memory, it compacts a partition by walking through the hash index and copying all reachable elements into a fresh partition. After that, it releases the memory of the partition to compact.

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CompactingHashTable.EntryIterator
      Iterator that traverses the whole hash table once If entries are inserted during iteration they may be overlooked by the iterator
      class  CompactingHashTable.HashTableProber<PT>

      private java.util.ArrayList<MemorySegment> availableMemory
      The free memory segments currently available to the hash join.

      An estimate for the average record length.

      Constant for the forward pointer, indicating that the pointer is not set.
      private static int BUCKET_HEADER_LENGTH 
      private static int BUCKET_POINTER_START_OFFSET 
      private MemorySegment[] buckets
      The array of memory segments that contain the buckets which form the actual hash-table of hash-codes and pointers to the elements.
      private int bucketsPerSegmentBits
      The number of bits that describe the position of a bucket in a memory segment.
      private int bucketsPerSegmentMask
      The number of hash table buckets in a single memory segment - 1.
      private InMemoryPartition<T> compactionMemory
      Temporary storage for partition compaction (always attempts to allocate as many segments as the largest partition)
      private static int DEFAULT_RECORD_LEN
      The default record width that is used when no width is given.
      private static int HASH_BUCKET_SIZE 
      private static int HASH_CODE_LEN
      The length of the hash code stored in the bucket.
      private static int HEADER_COUNT_OFFSET
      Offset of the field in the bucket header indicating the bucket's status (spilled or in-memory).
      private static int HEADER_FORWARD_OFFSET
      Offset of the field in the bucket header that holds the forward pointer to its first overflow bucket.
      private static int HEADER_PARTITION_OFFSET
      Offset of the field in the bucket header indicating the bucket's partition.
      private boolean isResizing
      Flag necessary so a resize is never triggered during a resize since the code paths are interleaved
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private static int MAX_NUM_PARTITIONS
      The maximum number of partitions
      private static int MIN_NUM_MEMORY_SEGMENTS
      The minimum number of memory segments that the compacting hash table needs to work properly

      The number of buckets in the current table.

      The total storage overhead per record, in bytes.

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG

      • MIN_NUM_MEMORY_SEGMENTS

        private static final int MIN_NUM_MEMORY_SEGMENTS

        The maximum number of partitions
        另请参阅:

      • DEFAULT_RECORD_LEN

        private static final int DEFAULT_RECORD_LEN
        The default record width that is used when no width is given. The record width is used to determine the ratio of the number of memory segments intended for partition buffers and the number of memory segments in the hash-table structure.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • HASH_CODE_LEN

        private static final int HASH_CODE_LEN
        The length of the hash code stored in the bucket.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • POINTER_LEN

        private static final int POINTER_LEN
        The length of a pointer from a hash bucket to the record in the buffers.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • RECORD_TABLE_BYTES

        private static final int RECORD_TABLE_BYTES
        The number of bytes that the entry in the hash structure occupies, in bytes. It corresponds to a 4 byte hash value and an 8 byte pointer.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • RECORD_OVERHEAD_BYTES

        private static final int RECORD_OVERHEAD_BYTES
        The total storage overhead per record, in bytes. This corresponds to the space in the actual hash table buckets, consisting of a 4 byte hash value and an 8 byte pointer, plus the overhead for the stored length field.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • NUM_INTRA_BUCKET_BITS

        另请参阅:

        private static final long BUCKET_FORWARD_POINTER_NOT_SET

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • availableMemory

        private final java.util.ArrayList<MemorySegment> availableMemory
        The free memory segments currently available to the hash join.

      • segmentSize

        private final int segmentSize
        The size of the segments used by the hash join buckets. All segments must be of equal size to ease offset computations.

      • bucketsPerSegmentMask

        private final int bucketsPerSegmentMask
        The number of hash table buckets in a single memory segment - 1. Because memory segments can be comparatively large, we fit multiple buckets into one memory segment. This variable is a mask that is 1 in the lower bits that define the number of a bucket in a segment.

      • bucketsPerSegmentBits

        private final int bucketsPerSegmentBits
        The number of bits that describe the position of a bucket in a memory segment. Computed as log2(bucketsPerSegment).

      • avgRecordLen

        private final int avgRecordLen
        An estimate for the average record length.

      • pageSizeInBits

        private final int pageSizeInBits

      • partitions

        private final java.util.ArrayList<InMemoryPartition<T>> partitions
        The partitions of the hash table.

      • buckets

        private MemorySegment[] buckets
        The array of memory segments that contain the buckets which form the actual hash-table of hash-codes and pointers to the elements.

      • compactionMemory

        private InMemoryPartition<T> compactionMemory
        Temporary storage for partition compaction (always attempts to allocate as many segments as the largest partition)

      • numBuckets

        private int numBuckets
        The number of buckets in the current table. The bucket array is not necessarily fully used, when not all buckets that would fit into the last segment are actually used.

      • running

        private boolean running
        Flag to interrupt closed loops

      • isResizing

        private boolean isResizing
        Flag necessary so a resize is never triggered during a resize since the code paths are interleaved

    • 方法详细资料

      • open

        public void open()
        Initialize the hash table
        指定者:
        open 在类中 AbstractMutableHashTable<T>

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the hash table. This effectively releases all internal structures and closes all open files and removes them. The call to this method is valid both as a cleanup after the complete inputs were properly processed, and as an cancellation call, which cleans up all resources that are currently held by the hash join. If another process still access the hash table after close has been called no operations will be performed.
        指定者:
        close 在类中 AbstractMutableHashTable<T>

        private void insertBucketEntryFromStart(MemorySegment bucket,
                                        int bucketInSegmentPos,
                                        int hashCode,
                                        long pointer,
                                        int partitionNumber)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        IMPORTANT!!! We pass only the partition number, because we must make sure we get a fresh partition reference. The partition reference used during search for the key may have become invalid during the compaction.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • getPartitioningFanOutNoEstimates

        private static int getPartitioningFanOutNoEstimates(int numBuffers)
        Gets the number of partitions to be used for an initial hash-table, when no estimates are available.

        The current logic makes sure that there are always between 10 and 32 partitions, and close to 0.1 of the number of buffers.

        参数:
        numBuffers - The number of buffers available.
        返回:
        The number of partitions to use.

      • getMemoryConsumptionString

        private java.lang.String getMemoryConsumptionString()
        返回:
        String containing a summary of the memory consumption for error messages
